entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 6:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low zero.
